name: Hussein T. Mouftah
content: Hussein Mouftah Dr. Hussein Mouftah Canada Research Chair in Wireless Sensor Networks Distinguished University Professor, University of Ottawa Research Interests: Computer Networks Optical Networking Wireless Communication Networks Wireless Sensor Networks Teaching Biography Curriculum Vitae Experience: Academic, Research, Industrial Dr. Hussein Mouftah University of Ottawa School of Information Technology and Engineering(SITE) 800 King Edward Avenue Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1N 6N5 Tel: (613) 562-5800 ext. 2173 Fax: (613) 562-5664 Email: mouftah@site.uottawa.ca Contactez: L'?ole d'Ing?ierie et de Technologie de l'Information Contact: School of Information Technology and Engineering Copyright ?
